snippet: Genetic analysis of venom allows Indian investigators to determine whether it came from an endangered cobra, helping them to prosecute traffickers.
abstract: Genetic analysis of venom allows Indian investigators to determine whether it came from an endangered cobra, helping them to prosecute traffickers.
lead_paragraph: Smuggling dried cobra venom has its challenges. First there's the difficulty of milking these highly venomous snakes; it takes time, patience and skill. (It took the legendary snake wrangler Bill Haast three years and 69,000 milkings to produce one pint of coral snake venom, for example.)

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
